update t_component
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update t_component set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, component_name = #{componentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_up = #{stockUp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_lower = #{stockLower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_component set
num = num + (#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}),
version = #{ver,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_dttm = now() where 1 = 1
and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and #{ver,jdbcType=BIGINT} > version
